dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria, a mystical realm of wonder and magic.

dialogues.speaker: Eira the Brave
dialogues.text: I've heard rumors of a legendary sword hidden deep within the nearby forest. I'm determined to find it!

dialogues.speaker: Arin the Wise
dialogues.text: Be careful, Eira. The forest is full of dark creatures and ancient ruins. You'll need all your wits about you.
